Text: Course for AttorneysTOXICOLOGY LABS INC SOUTH TH STREET OMAHA NE TEL NO FAX NO Web pages OR wwwdtektcom Email or FREMONT OFFICE DrJohn VasiliadesPhDDABCCDABFT DEA PV Forensic Toxicologist LabCode No L September Dear Ladies and Gentlemen This letter is to inform you and your office that we offer forensic laboratory drug services and that I will again be available as an expert or consultant in Forensic Toxicology Urine Drug Testing and Alcohol DWI criminal and civil cases in My daily rate is plus expenses for jury trials and plus expenses for nonjury trials My hourly rate is plus expenses The initial min consultation is free I have testified in over cases Please call me if you have any questions or if you need additional information TAX ID OR FID Sincerely John Vasiliades PhD Laboratory Director Please forward your FAX number and any address change Thank you Refunds credited to account only Obtain Dr Vasiliades CV at Web page PLEASE POST PLEASE POST PLEASE POST YOU CAN NOW REGISTER ONLINE WITH YOUR CREDIT CARD AT FORENSIC TOXICOLOGY FOR ATTORNEYS ALCOHOL AND DRUGS HOW TO BETTER USE AN EXPERT Special Topics Ecstasy MDMA and Meth November to PM A UNIQUE INTENSIVE DAY WORKSHOP AND COURSE IN FORENSIC LABORATORY TOXICOLOGY IN OMAHANEBRASKA FEE FOR INFORMATION WRITE OR CALL DR JOHN VASILIADESPhDDABCCDABFT TOXICOLOGY LABS INC South th St OMAHA NE TEL NO FAX NO Web pages OR wwwdtektcom Email TOXLABS aolcom or Expert Witness and Laboratory Services in Alcohol and Drugs FORENSIC TOXICOLOGY FOR ATTORNEYS NAME TITLE AFFILIATION ADDRESS CITYSTATEZIP PHONE FAX Amount enclosed FEE I cannot attend at this time would like to attend next session CLE CREDIT AVAILABLE This course has been accredited for hours of continuing legal education by the states of Iowa KansasIdaho Utah Nebraska Crime Commission and hours by the states of Colorado and MissouriEnclosed is the information you or someone from your office requested Email us if you wish to be dropped from this email list
